title: Is It a REAL or FAKE Hallmark Christmas Movie + Stephen A. Smith on His New Animated Movie and Why He Hates the Cowboys + Bobby Asks Dr. Francis Collins on Getting the Booster
itunes:title: Is It a REAL or FAKE Hallmark Christmas Movie + Stephen A. Smith on His New Animated Movie and Why He Hates the Cowboys + Bobby Asks Dr. Francis Collins on Getting the Booster
description:
Bobby reads the title and description to a movie…the caller has to decide if it’s a REAL Hallmark Christmas movie…or if it’s FAKE and we made it up. We talk to Stephen A. Smith from ESPN about his new animated movie Rumble, his life as a sports analyst and Eddie asks him if he think the Dallas Cowboys could win the Super Bowl this year. We talk to Dr. Francis Collins about the booster, his new book and why he’s retiring.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
